content: start to sew place the both legs as you want it with pins and place the love bunny on a straight table now you will see if they are placed correctly against each other and that the body s bottom still touches the ground attach the legs not just on the edge sew also the inside of the leg against the body this is to make sure that the legs will always stay close to the body see dotted line above place the arms on each side between round 14 and 17 aligned with the legs attach the arms not just on the edge sew also the inside of the arm against the body this is to make sure that the arms will always stay close to the body see dotted line above attach the tail between rounds 5 and 7 centered at the back 14 place the big heart at the bottom of the ear sew the hearts to the ears by draw the needle only on the loops that are visible on the out- side of the ear front loops this way the pink threads will not be visible on the backside of the ears attach the ears on each side of the head from round 8 sew a small area of inside of the ear to the head so the ears stays nicely downwards see dotted line above now you re done 15 your love bunny is done thank you for making her gorgeous work share your tag me on instagram congrats @handmade_by_halime
